item.description:
Join others from Boston Small Business Success Network at the professional networking event sponsored by Mass Networking in Framingham.

It's time to make some valuable new business contacts in 2013, so come meet and network with other professionals.

Practical Details

  • Bring business cards, a smile, and a professional attitude
  • Dress code is business casual
  • Appetizers
  • Lots of free parking
  • Over 100 Beers and 36 Drafts available
  • Free Raffle for Boston Area Event Tickets plus More Giveaways

Cost and How to Register

Get Your Tickets Now!  The event fees start from $5 prepaid or $10 cash at the door if space is available!  We will see you on Monday, 2/11 at British Beer Company in Framingham!

Register here or click the yellow Register Now button to reserve your spot.

 

Make sure to mark your calendar now so you don't forget.

Got Questions?

You can post your questions below.
item.name: Framingham Professional Networking
